 Candidate No.:   Benhard Landis  
 
 
PERSONAL DETAILS  
 
 
Location:    Koble nz, Germany   
Languages :   German  and English ( Fluent) , French (Good)  
 
QUALIFICATIONS  
 
Studied Chemistry at University of Konstanz, Chemistry Diploma (1983 -1990)   
National Military Service  in Ellwangen/Jagst and Sigmaringen  (1982- 1983)  
AKAD -Course "Business Studies and Marketing for scientists"  (1995 -1996)  
   
CAREER SUMMARY  
 
2016 to date Schwabe Pharma, Karlsruhe  
Position: Head of Physician Field Sales Germany  
Tasks :       
• Management of the Germa n physician sales force (7 regional managers and 84 sales reps) as well as the 
Medical Service Management Team with 1 team leader and 5 employees  
• Increase physician’s recommendations for the top products in close cooperation with th e pharmacy sales 
force  
• Close cooperation with marketing, medical affairs, sales controlling and all other departments  
• Selection and recruitment of new field and office staff   
• Performance Management; coaching and motivation of assigned employees   
• Organi sation and content of s ales conferences, kick -off meetings and regional manager meetings  
• Support of Key Opinion Leaders and participation in advisory boards  
• Success analysis according to indication areas, customer groups and geography  
• Planning, determin ation, control of funds  and expenditure of sales budgets  
 
Successes:  
• Sales 142 million € in 2019: 0.5% above plan   
• In 2016 successful expansion of the physician field service by 40 positions  
• Optimization of the sales strategy of the medical field ser vice with the goal of a significantly higher customer 
orientation through  the implementation of emotional selling  
• Improvement of the cooperation between physician and pharmacy field service   
 
2014 – 2016: Norgine Gmb H, Marburg   
Position : Sales Manager  Germany      
Tasks :         
• Management of German Sales Force (66  people) + o ffice-based team (5 people)  
• 11 Direct reports: 5 District Managers, 1 National KAM SCP, 1 Sales Associate, 1 Sales Information 
Manager, 1 Customer Service Coordinator und 2 Commercial Coordinators  
• Member of German Management Board and Europea n Sales Mana gers Team  
• Compliance Officer of Norgine GmbH   
• Close collaboration with Marketing, Medical and other departments   
 • Cooperation and negotiation with the works council regarding all sales -related topics  
• Selection and recruitment of new field -based and offi ce-based staff   
• Performance Management, coaching and motivation of assigned employees   
• Managing Key accounts and Key opinion leaders/ Participation in Advisory Boards  
 
Successes :         
• Turnover €77m in 2015 =10% sales growth. In 2014 sales grow th 13% over previous year (in both years most 
successful Business Unit within the European Norgine Group)  
• Successful coverage of many tasks of the vacant General Manager position from May to Oct 2 014  
• Additional appointment as Compliance Officer since Jan  2015  
 
2012 – 2013: Qiagen GmbH, Hilden  
Position:  Sales Director QuantiFERON D -A-CH and Poland  
Tasks :         
• Responsible for sales of Quantiferon portfolio (diagnosis of latent tuberculosis and Cytomegalie  virus 
infection) in Germany, Austria, Switzerland and Poland  
• Lead 6 Sales Managers and 2 Inside Sales specialists  
• Member of EMEA Quant iferon Management team. Managed international key accounts and KOLs   
• Planned and implemented specific activ ities to increase market share  
 
Successes :         
• Sales growth 20% vs 2012. Initiation and implementation of Co -marketing campaign with big lab chains and 
pharmaceu tical companies  
• Launch of control panel as quality control for hospitals and reference la bs  
• Successful integration of the Cellestis sales team into the QIAGEN structure whilst simultaneously exceeding 
sales targets. 250 new lab customers won  
 
 
2008 – 2012: Cellestis GmbH, Darmstadt  
Position: Commercial Director D ACH and Poland  
Tasks :         
• Member of EMEA Management team. Prepared business + budget plan for Quantiferon portfolio  
• Built an international sales team in four countries – German

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
